name: Peak Rewards for EV Chargers
description: $25 enrollment bonus plus $9 per month for enrolling Emporia EV charger in managed charging program; charging pauses during peak events with option to override
fullDescription: San Jose Clean Energy pays EV owners for enrolling eligible chargers in their managed charging program, pausing charging during peak events with override option.
whatTheyOffer:
- $25 enrollment bonus
- $9 per month ongoing payment
- Compatible with Emporia EV charger
- Managed charging during peak events
- Option to override any pause
- Annual earnings of $108+ after bonus
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a San Jose Clean Energy customer
2. Must have Emporia EV charger
3. Enroll charger through program portal
4. Allow charger to connect to program
5. Charging pauses during peak events
6. Override option always available
keywords: SJCE, San Jose Clean Energy, Peak Rewards, EV charger, $25 bonus, $9 per month, Emporia, managed charging, demand response
